member.name: M:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.DbContexts.ConfigurationDbContext`1.OnModelCreating(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ModelBuilder)
member.summary: Override this method to further configure the model that was discovered by convention from the entity types exposed in properties on your derived context. The resulting model may be cached and re-used for subsequent instances of your derived context.
member.param: The builder being used to construct the model for this context. Databases (and other extensions) typically define extension methods on this object that allow you to configure aspects of the model that are specific to a given database.
member.remarks: If a model is explicitly set on the options for this context (via ) then this method will not be run.

member.name: T:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions
member.summary: Options for configuring the operational context.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.ConfigureDbContext
member.summary: Callback to configure the EF DbContext.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.ResolveDbContextOptions
member.summary: Callback in DI resolve the EF DbContextOptions. If set, ConfigureDbContext will not be used.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.DefaultSchema
member.summary: Gets or sets the default schema.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.PersistedGrants
member.summary: Gets or sets the persisted grants table configuration.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.DeviceFlowCodes
member.summary: Gets or sets the device flow codes table configuration.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.Keys
member.summary: Gets or sets the keys table configuration.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.ServerSideSessions
member.summary: Gets or sets the user sessions table configuration.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.PushedAuthorizationRequests
member.summary: Gets or sets the pushed authorization requests configuration.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.EnableTokenCleanup
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether stale entries will be automatically cleaned up from the database. This is implemented by periodically connecting to the database (according to the TokenCleanupInterval) from the hosting application. Defaults to false.
member.value: true if [enable token cleanup]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.RemoveConsumedTokens
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether consumed tokens will be included in the automatic clean up.
member.value: true if consumed tokens are to be included in cleanup; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.ConsumedTokenCleanupDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the consumed token cleanup delay (in seconds). The default is 0. This delay is the amount of time that must elapse before tokens marked as consumed can be deleted. Note that only refresh tokens with OneTimeOnly usage can be marked as consumed.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.TokenCleanupInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the token cleanup interval (in seconds). The default is 3600 (1 hour).

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.FuzzTokenCleanupStart
member.summary: If multiple nodes are running the token cleanup at the same time, there will be concurrency issues in the database updates. To reduce the risk, the startup time of the first run can be fuzzed (randomized). The default is true.
member.value: true if startup time should be fuzzed, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.TokenCleanupBatchSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of records to remove at a time. Defaults to 100.
member.value: The size of the token cleanup batch.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.EnablePooling
member.summary: Gets or set if EF DbContext pooling is enabled.

member.name: P:Jash.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Options.OperationalStoreOptions.PoolSize
member.summary: Gets or set the pool size to use when DbContext pooling is enabled. If not set, the EF default is used.
